Please continue to check our website, or district social media accounts, for further updates.

div.p: Click the image to watch Mr. Wilcher on WMAZ13!

There is a Literacy movement that is moving from the State Capital to Jeffersonville Elementary School. Thank you Superintendent Richard Woods for promoting literacy at JES and supplying books to our Scholars. Your generosity will enable our scholars to take a book home and begin to build a personal reading library! Click here for PHOTOS.

p.br: The spotlight is on Senior Erica Glover. Watch to see all of the wonderful things she got to experience this summer.

img.br:
Elgin L. Dixon
Superintendent of Schools
